wikipedia_page.main:
Augustus Louis Ricardo (28 March 1843 – 19 April 1871) was an English cricketer. Ricardo was born in Chelsea, London.
Ricardo made a single first-class appearance for Hampshire in 1861 against the Marylebone Cricket Club. In the match he scored 5 runs and took 2 catches.Ricardo died on 19 April 1871 in Cologne, German Empire.
